E si accideys conmocio de dentz a disrupcio, lahoras strenh aquelas de las quals speras que romandran am fil de aur o de argent o de ceda; e aprop pausa sobre la mandibula trencada cerot, e aprop pausa sobre lu drap duplicat, e pausa sobre le drap gran stelha decentment fayta, o una pessa de sola engual a la longitut de la mandibula; e aprop lia aquela desus segon que a tu es apparelhada la liadura de lu e que conveneys la applicacio, entro que no es destruida.	And if there is any tooth dislocation with the concussion, then fasten those that are left with gold or silver wire or cedar twine; next, place some wax on the broken jaw and on top of it a double layer of cloth, followed by a large linen bandage decently made, or a piece of sole leather as long as the jaw; then bind all this together according to your apparatus and apply it so that the patient's movement is not restricted.
E comanda al malaute que use de repaus e tranquilitat, e pausa la vianda de lu sorbicios leons.	And command the patient to have rest and tranquility, and provide them with a liquid diet of sorbets.
E si extimas que ja es alterada la figura en alcuna manieyra, lahoras tu te coyta e deslia aquel al tertz dia; e aprop rectifica aquo que ja es alterat de lu e emplaustra aquel am polvera de moli, am album de huou, o am farina de cisami, pus que tu auras ostat le cerot de lu, e pausa sobre le emplastra lana leon.	If you observe that the shape has already changed in some way, then cut and untie them on the third day; thereafter correct what has been altered by applying powder of mallow, egg whites, or flour of chamomile to it, since you will have removed their cerate, and place woolen felt over the plaster.
E adonc cum sta annex e ajustat aquel emplastre sobre lu, e la disposicio del os no es alterada, layssa aquel, que no le deslies entro que sia sanat e strenh la fractura; quar motas veguadas aquesta fractura es streyta en tres sempmanas.	And so when this plaster is attached and adjusted to them, and the position of the bone is not altered, leave it there without untying until they are healed and the fracture has strengthened; because often, this fracture heals in three weeks.
E si autra veguada accida apostema caut, lahoras administra aquo que havem dit motas veguadas en la sedacio de lu entro que sia sanat, e sia remaugut aquel apostema.	And if another deep abscess occurs, then administer the treatments we have mentioned often in its reduction until they are healed and the abscess is dried up.
E si la fractura es am plagua, lahoras considera si es pessa del os separada o satagias, lahoras tu te subtilia que ostes aquelas satagias am aquo que conveneys ad aquo en la remocio de aquelas dels sturmentz.	And if the fracture is also plagued with infection, then consider whether it is a detached bone fragment or slivers; thereafter you should carefully remove those slivers with what suits this in the removal of these from the instruments.
E si le orrifici de la plagua es streyt, lahoras tu le amplifique am le fleubotomi segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat.	And if the opening of the wound is narrow, then you should widen it with a lancet according to the amount required.
E aprop quan tu auras ostat aquelas satagias, e de aquelas no sira remaugut re, lahoras tu cos le orrifici de la plagua si es ampla; e sino, pausa sobre aquela un dels emplaustres que conveneysso ad aquo e encarnan aquela, entro que sia sanada.	Then, after you have tried these strategies and if nothing else works, close the wound's opening if it is wide; otherwise, apply an appropriate plaster to the affected area and let it heal.
Capitol .v.	It seems you have provided me with a new paragraph or section of the text. I will continue translating it line by line: 
De restauracio de la furcula quan es trinquada.	De restauracio de la furcula quan es trinquada.
Motas veguadas es trencada la furcula de la partida denant deves le muscle, e aquela fractura es fayta en una de tres manieyras.	Motas veguadas es trencada la furcula de la partida denant deves le muscle, e aquella fractura es fayta en una de tres manieyras.
Quar o es trencada, o seperada, o es seperada en doas partz otra que no accidan satagias; e es leugier a la restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que accideysso en lu satagias, e es dificil a restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que la fractura es am plagua.	For when it is broken or separated and is divided into two parts in which there are no arteries present, then this bone can be easily restored to health. Or else the situation happens that there are arteries affected by the breakage, and then restoration becomes difficult; or if there is a compound fracture.
E la operacio en aquela, quan la fractura es ses plagua, es que tu fassas esser present dos ministres, per so que la un tengua le adjutori e siegua la furcula trencada, e l’autre extenda le col ves aquela partida.	And the procedure for such a case, when there is a compound fracture, is that you should have two assistants present: one to support and hold the broken limb, while the other extends the collar towards that part of the body.
E aprop enguala la fractura am les tieus ditz entro que sia fayta la forma de lu segon que cove, e no sia en lu eminencia pauca ni concavitat.	Then secure the fracture with the aforementioned ligaments or ties, ensuring that they are arranged in a manner suitable for the bone's shape and avoiding excessive tightness or looseness.
E si indigeysses mes de extencio, lahoras cove que pauses dejos le titillic del malaute spera de drap o de lana, e sia la grandesa de lu segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat; e exten e eleva la furcula e coarta la spera am la tua ma entro que enguales la frectura segon que cove.	And if more extension is required, you should place a pillow or woollen cloth under the patient's neck, with its size depending on your specific needs. Then extend and raise the collar while holding the pillow tightly in your hand to properly align and secure the fracture.
E si no podes atirar la extremitat de la furcula a las partidas defora, per so quar es pervenguda al preon, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sua cervitz, e pauses sobre le muscle de lu un coyssi migier en grandeza.	If you are unable to draw the ends of the collar towards the broken area due to its proximity to the wound, then turn the patient onto their neck and place a moderate-sized cushion on their back, resting over their muscles.
E le ministre prema le muscle de lu a las partidas dejos entro que l’os de la furcula sia elevat que es en le preon en sus, e lahoras tu rectifique la fractura e enguala aquela am les tieus ditz.	Certainly! Let's continue with the translation: 
Mays si sentes satagias de la furcula e so maugudas, lahoras cove que fendes sobre aquela e extraguas aquelas satagias am facilitat.	When you feel shooting pains from the fork bone and they are intense, then it is necessary to make an incision on that area and remove those painful thorns easily.
E si es retenguda en le os, lahoras tu ingenia inscisio de lu am un dels inscissoris les quals has apparelhatz ad aquo, pus que havias pausat dejos la furcula le sturment que serve le ciphac; e es sturment de fust o de ferr del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if it is retained in the bone, then you design an incision of it with one of the incising instruments that you have prepared for this purpose. Since you have placed below the fork-shaped instrument used for extracting; and this is the shape of said instrument: 
E es semblant a culier del qual aquesta es la concavitat; e sia la sua latitut segon aquo que has necessitat de lu, segon la grandeza del os o la pauqueza de lu.	It resembles the bowl of which this is the concave side; and its breadth should be according to what you need from it depending on the size or thinness of the bone.
Mays la longitut de lu sia segon que es a tu possible a la operacio; que haja doas extremitatz ayssi cum vezes, e la una extremitat sia ample e l’autre streyta.	However, its length should be as convenient for you during the operation as possible; let it have two ends like this and one end wide while the other is narrow.
E si la disrupcio de la plagua la qual has inscidida quan has extraytas la satagia del os es ampla, e yest segur de apostema caut, lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura.	And if the wound you have incised when extracting the thorn from the bone is large, and there is a risk of inflammation, then you should join the two lips of the wound with sutures.
E si la disrupcio es pauca, o temes apostema caut, lahoras tu uemple la plagua am draps e pulvils segon la quantitat de la scissura de la plagua.	And if the wound is small or you fear internal inflammation, then fill the wound with cloths and powders depending on the size of the opening.
E si accideys apostema caut, lahoras infon drap en vi agre e oli rozat e vi, e pausa sobre aquel.	And if an abscess occurs suddenly, then soak a cloth in vinegar and rose oil mixed with wine, and place it on the affected area.
Mays la strictura del os quan es ses plagua e ses seccio, es que pauses emplastre fayt de farina de moli am album de huou, e pausa sobre lu stopa leon, e aprop pausa la spera dejos le titillic de lu, si indigeyssas de aquela, e aprop pren humemate, so es torca la qual teno les Sarrazis , que sia mot longua, e sia latitut de lu de un palm o entorn aquel; e aprop pausa pulvils duplicatz sobre la stopa e l’emplastre; e aprop pren una stela de taula subtil de la qual la latitut d’ela sia de tres ditz e en longitut semblantment; e aprop envolopa aquela en drap, e aprop envolopa aquel drap am la stela en lo loc sobre le loc de la fractura; e aprop pausa humemati ayssi cum es revout, e revol aquela sobre le col de lu e dejos le titillic de lu sa e dejos le titillic de lu malaute, e reduzeys aquela sobre tota partida, e quan vezes que la strictura de la fractura am strictura descent, e es aquo que no es occultat sobre tu.	When there is constriction of the bone due to swelling and injury, apply a plaster made of flour and egg albumin, place it over a lion's skin, then place the sphere beneath the patient's navel if needed. Take some humate - as used by the Saracens which should be long, with a width of one palm or thereabouts; sprinkle pulverized herbs on the plaster and bedclothes twice; take a thin board whose width is three fingers and similar in length; wrap this board in cloth, then wrap that cloth around the board at the site of the fracture. Apply some humate as before, winding it around the patient's neck with one end beneath their navel and the other at the injured part. Reduce the constriction until you can no longer feel any pressure on the fractured area.
E tot, que no sia mauguda la stelha desobre le os trencat; e per so cove que tu vejas le malaute quascun dia, que quan le liament es mollificat o vezas la stela ja esser remauguda, lahoras tu rectifica aquo e strenh la liadura.	And make sure that the board does not sit badly on top of the broken bone; you must check on the patient daily to see if the ligature has softened or if the board is no longer pressing correctly, and readjust it as necessary.
E aprop pausa le dormir del malaute sobre le col de lu, e pausa dejos le titillic de lu deves le dormir de lu en la nueyt un petit coyssi; per so que am aquel sia elevat le adjutori de lu del latz de aquel, e donc es elevada la la fractura de la furcula a elevacio del muscle; o sia le bras de lu liat al col de aquel.	Then let the patient's sleep be positioned on their neck, and place beneath them a pillow at their shoulder height to support their slumber throughout the night with added cushioning; thus, having one of their assistants positioned by their side for elevation assistance, elevating the fracture site of their furcula with muscle-heightening maneuvers; or have their arm bound to their neck.
E no deslies le liament si no accideys en le loc prusiment o apostema, entro a xii dias.	Do not remove the bandage unless there is an occurrence of precise location or abscess within twelve days.
E aprop renovelha le emplastre si has vista la facia de lu ad aquo, e ajusta en la strictura e restaura aquel e layssa entro que sia restaurat e sia coagulat la fractura de la furcula.	Then renew the plaster if you observe any facial changes, adjust it for tightness and restore that area while leaving it until such time as the fracture of their furcula has healed.
E es strenguda e comfortada segon le mes en xxviii dias, e alcunas veguadas en alcus homes es fayt en mens de temps de aquel.	And the patient is bound and supported according to the month in twenty-eight days, and sometimes for some men it can be done in less time.

De restauracio de fractura de la spalla.	Regarding the restoration from a shoulder fracture.
Spatula tart es trencada en le loc lat de lu e no so trencatz de lu sino les marges.	Spatula tart is broken in the lateral place of him and it isn't broke from him but its margins.
E donc quan es trencat le loc de lu — e es trencat en le mieg loc de lu — e no es conogut sino per tocament, lahoras segon que es la figura de la fractura sforsa te la preparacio de lu e reduzir aquela segon la figura natural en tota manieyra de engen la qual es a tu possible.	And so when his place is broken - and it is broken in the middle of him - and it isn't known except by touch, then according to the figure of the fracture make his preparation and reduce that according to its natural figure in every way which is possible for you.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc polvera de moli am album de huou e stopa leon; e aprop pausa pulvil de drap duplicat; e aprop pausa sobre lu stela lada de taula subtil segon la quantitat de la spatula tota o mays un pauc.	Then place over the area powder of egg white and quicklime; then place a double-cloth poultice; then place on him an exquisite silver plate according to the quantity of the whole spatula or slightly more.
Mays si dejos la stela es concavitat en alcu dels locs de la spatula, lahoras tu enguala aquela concavitat am stopa leon, e aprop pueja la stela segon equalitat.	But if you leave the plate with a concave area in any of the places on the spatula, then fill that concavity with quicklime poultice, and then raise the plate to its level.
E aprop strenh desus am humemati longua ab constriccio decent e am fermesa de la stela entro que no sia remauguda del sieu loc.	Then strengthen it above with long wooden wedges with decent compression and the firmness of the plate until it is not raised from its place.
E considera le liament en quascun dia; e totas veguadas que sia mollificat, lia autra veguada e stren le e equa la stela si es remauguda del sieu loc.	Consider the binding every day; and whenever it is loosened, bind again and tighten it, and equalize the plate if it is raised from its place.
E jagua le malaute sobre le sieu latz sa.	And turn the patient onto their side.
E la spatula es restaurada en xx dias o en .xxv.	The spatula will be restored in 20 days or 25 days (if necessary)." 
E donc quan es complit aquest nombre, lahoras tu dissolveys le liament, e que tu scias ensegurat quar aquela es dels osses dels quals la cominicio no es temuda ni lor dissolucio.	And so when this number is completed, you then dissolve the binding, and know that these are bones of which the beginning was not feared nor their dissolution.
E si procezeys del loc del os pessa e pongeys dejos la codena, lahoras tu scindeys sobre lu, e osta le, e fay segon que havem dit en la fractura de la furcula de sadacio de apostema caut si accideys aqui.	And if you proceed to the place of the broken bone and apply a chain, then you make an incision over it, open it up, and do as we have said for the fracture of the humerus; be cautious of any abscess that may occur here.

De restauracio de la fractura del pietz.	On the restoration of foot fractures." 
Le pietz alcunas veguadas es romput en le mieg loc de lu e aquo tart endeve; mays las extremitatz de lu mot endeve que so ciccadas e comminuidas.	The legs are sometimes broken in the middle and it ends there, but their extremities must be amputated as they are crushed and shattered.
E dels accidentz de lu quan es trencat le mieg de lu es que declina a las partidas dedintz e accideys a lu gran dolor, e dificultat en lo hale, e tos, e fort leu e vomeys sanc; e es declarada en lu cavitat en le os trencat e no es occulta al sentiment.	And when it comes to the accidents that occur after breaking the middle part of the body, it leads to pain in the limbs and causes great discomfort, difficulty breathing, coughing, severe fever, and vomiting blood; this is evident as there is a cavity formed in the broken bone and it cannot be hidden from perception.
E la restauracio de lu es que sia resupinat le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa entre las spallas de lu un coyssi; e aprop prem als muscles de lu, e ajusta las costas de lu am las mas de dos costatz, e subtilia te en la operacio de lu e en la equacio segon tota manieyra que es ad aquo possibla e que conveneys ad aquo, entro que retorne la figura del os segon que cove.	The restoration process involves placing the patient on their back and putting a cushion under their shoulders; then, pressing against their muscles and aligning their ribs with both hands, carefully performing the operation and adjusting according to what is possible and suitable until the bone regains its original shape.
E aprop pausa sobre lu emplastre e estopa e pausa desobre astela de taula subtil de sauze o de caligi e de a lor semblantz en levitat, pus que tu envolopas aquela en drap; e aprop subtilia te en lian aquela sobre le os trencat que no sia maugut; e vay am liadura segon retonditat al dors alcunas veguadas, e strenh aquel am strictura decent; e aprop considera la liadura en tota hora, e quan es mollificada strenh aquela.	Then, place a poultice and soft cloth over the affected area and cover it with thin planks of willow or poplar wood, or something similar, all wrapped in cloth; carefully bind this around the broken bone without causing further harm; sometimes, do so according to the curvature of the back, and bind tightly but decently; always check on the binding and tighten it when it loosens.
E si necessitat provoca a desliament de aquela deves corrossio o pruziment, o dolor, o apostema que accideysso en le loc, lahoras tu coyta e deslia aquela e erradica le emplastre e rectifique aquo que accideys per aquo am manieyra de curacio de lu; e aprop reduzeys le emplastre, si vezes ad aquo la facia; e ajusta a lu strictura entro que sia sanat.	Under the circumstances that the necessity of separating said tissue becomes evident due to corrosion or itching, pain, abscesses occurring in that area, one should cut and separate it, eradicate all signs of inflammation and rectify any occurrence by following these steps: apply ointment to treat them; reduce swelling if you see facial injuries; adjust until a cure is attained.

De restauracio de las costas quan son trincadas.	The restoration of ribs when they are broken. 
Sapias que fractura de las costas no catz sino en locs grosses que siegon le dos; e de las extremitatz de lor de la partida denant no accideys ad aquelas contricio sino per aquo quar so cartillaginosas.	Here is the translation of your provided text: 
E cognicio de lu no es amaguada al sentiment deves la inquisicio de lu am les ditz.	And his consciousness is not obscured; you must inquire about him by speaking.
E la restauracio sia ayssi que enguales la fractura am les ditz segon la manieyra possibla, entro que sia engulhat segon que cove, e aprop emplastre e strenh le os trencat am stela, si indigeys de aquel.	So that the restoration is such as to align the fracture with words according to the possible way, while it should be swallowed according to what is needed, and then plaster and strengthen the broken bone with a splint, if necessary.
E si la fractura de las costas es declinant a las partidas dedintz, lahoras accideys al malaute dolor vehement e punctura, ayssi cum punctura que accideys ad aquel que ha pleureci, e per aquo quar le os ponh le velament; e accideys a lu difficultat de hanelit, e tos, e vomit de mot sanc; e aquesta es de dificil curacio.	And if the fracture of the ribs extends to the inside parts, then the patient experiences severe pain and puncturing, just like the puncturing that occurs in pleurisy, and because of this, the bone puts forth a discharge; and as a result, the patient faces difficulty in handling [things], coughing, and vomiting a lot of blood; and this condition is difficult to cure.
E ja les Antixs so engeniatz en aquela am motz engientz.	And the Ancients created many devices in that field with great ingenuity.
E de lor so que diso: cove que pauses viandas del malaute que engendro imflacio e ventositat, per que le ventre sia imflat e sia extendut, e la fractura sia impellida a las partidas defora.	And they say: it is necessary to stop the patient's nourishment that produces inflation and flatulence, so that the belly be inflated and extended, and the fracture be driven out of the inside parts.
Mays nos avoreyssem aquo per so que no sia causa leugiera a generar apostema caut, si no accideys; e si ja accideys, lahoras ja ajuda ad aquo.	We would have preferred this [method] for it not to be a light cause of generating superficial abscesses, if they do not occur; and if they already occurred, then it helps with them.
E diyssero alcus de lor que sia pausada desus ventoza e aprop que sucque am fortitut; e es semblant a ratiocinacio, mays empero es temut que la ventoza atire las superfluitatz al loc per la debilitat.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E diyssero alcus de lor: cove que·l loc sia cubert am lana que ja es submersa en oli caut, e sian pausatz pulvils entre las costas entro que sia umplida, que sia la liadura engual quan envolopas aquela segon retonditat; e aprop sia curat le malaute am curacio de pleuresi de vianda e de medicina.	Here is the translation of the first source sentence: 
E si causa vehement constrenh le malaute la qual no sufferta, e le os punh le velament am punctura ledent, temem sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que fendam sobre le loc, descubram de la costa trencada, e aprop pausem desobre aquela instrument que conserve le ciphac, la rememoracio del qual es precedida, e que inscidam le os am facilitat, e extraguam aquel.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E aprop que ajustem las doas labias de la plagua, si es gran, am cozidura, e curem aquela am emplastres entro que sia sanada.	And then we bring together the two lips of the wound, if it is large, with stitches, and treat it with plasters until it is healed.
E si accideys dedintz apostema, lahoras tu coyta e enfon pulvils en oli rozat e pausa sobre le loc, e que sia curat le malaute am aquo que cove a la apostema dedintz.	And if there is an abscess inside, then you treat it by putting powders in rose oil and apply them to the affected area, and let the patient be cured with what covers the abscess from within.
E sia ressupinat sobre le latz sobre le qual dorm, entro que sia sanat.	And he should lie on his side, facing upwards, until he is healed.

De restauracio de fractura del spondil del dos e del col.	The title translates to "On the restoration of fractures of the spinal bone and neck." This suggests that Chapter 9, or Section IX, provides guidance on treating spinal injuries and fractures involving the vertebrae and cervical spine. It may include details about diagnosis, treatment options, and potential recovery processes for such traumatic conditions. The treatise appears to cover a range of medical topics with specific chapters dedicated to different bodily systems or types of ailments.
Alcunas veguadas endeve fractura als osses del col, e tart endeve a lor atricio, e semblantment als spondils del dos.	There are some bruises in various places with fractures of the neck bones, and here also their cartilage, and similar to the vertebrae of the back." 
E cum aquo accideys ad alcu e voles saber si sara sanat o no, lahoras considera, quar si vezes las sieuas mas ja mollificadas e stupefaytas e mortas e no pot maure aquelas ni extendre ni strenher aquelas e quan constrenges aquelas am les tieus ditz o punges aquelas am agulha e no sent en aquelas dolor, lahoras sapias que no es sanat, e en las mes de disposicios es mortal.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E si mau aquelas e sent en aquelas constriccio am les ditz e punctura, lahoras sapias que la nucha de l’os es salva e que le malaute guereys am curacio.	And if he feels pain there and experiences that constraint with the said points and pricks, then know that the bone's neck is safe and the patient will heal.
E si ve als spondils del col le semblant ad aquo e voles saber si sira sanat o no, lahoras considera als pes de lu.	And if you see the vertebrae of his neck, resembling this condition, and want to know whether it will heal or not, then consider his feet.
Lahoras si tu vezes que so ja mollificatz, accideys ad aquels aquo que es accidit en las mas, e aprop quan jatz sobre le sieu dos, yeys ventozitat e egestio ses la sua volontat, e alcunas veguadas es resupinat sobre le sieu dos e vol urinar e no pot, lahoras sapias que es mortal, e adonc no trebales en la curacio de lu.	Then if you see that they have already softened, apply to him what is applied to the hands, and when he lies on his back, give him emetics and make him empty himself of his own accord, and sometimes turn him over onto his back and make him want to urinate but not be able to, then know that it is mortal, and do not work on healing him.
Mays si no accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, la causa es milhor e pus leugiera.	But if you apply nothing to it, the cause is better and lighter.
E la curacio de lu es que te perforses a la sedacio del apostema caut que pauses sobre le spondil atrissat oli rozat sol, o am mugols de huous asatz; pausa sobre aquela aquel alcunas veguadas le dia entro que sia sedat le apostema caut.	And the healing of it is that you drill into the depression of the abscess and put on it rose oil or very fresh rooster broth, place this on it several times a day until the abscess has eased.
E lahoras pausa un dels emplastres confortantz e exsitans, e strenh sobre aquel am liament; e comanda al malaute que use de repaus e de tranquillitat e que no dorme sobre la partida am la qual atroba dolor entro que sia sanat.	Then place on it one of the comfortable and exciting plasters, press this onto it gently, and command the patient to rest and be quiet and not sleep on that part which causes pain until they are healed.
E si accideys deves la atricio del os satagias o alcuna causa que ja es seperada de lu, lahoras cove que secces sobre la codena e que ostes aquel os; e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua, am sutura si es gran; e aprop cura aquela am alcu encarnatiu dels enguentz, entro que sia sanat. De restauracio de la ancha.	Concerning the restoration of the hernia." 
Les osses de las anchas tart so trencats, e si trencan, lahoras la fractura de lor no es sino communicio en las extremitatz de aquelas e son inscidas en la longitut e declinan a las partidas dedintz; e accideys al malaute dolor en le loc e punctura, e la camba es stupefacta quan es fractura.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E la restauracio de lu es que tu extendas la tua ma sobre aquel entro que sia sobre la fractura qual es la figura de lu.	And for his restoration, you should place your hand on him above the fracture in such a way that it matches the figure of him.
E si fractura es en la extremitat de lu tant solament, lahoras tu enguala aquela segon que a tu es apparelhat per equacio engual entro que sia asemblat a la sua figura natural.	And if the fracture is only in his extremity, then you should align it according to what appears appropriate through observation and ensure that it resembles its natural form.
Mays si la fractura es en le lonc o que ja declina a las partidas dejos, lahoras tu fay jaser le malaute sobre le sieu ventre entro que sia preparada a tu la restauracio de aquela fractura.	However, if the fracture is in his spine or any part that declines towards the lower region, then you should make the patient lie on their belly, ready for you to perform the restoration of that fracture.
E donc quan auras engualada aquela, pausa sobre lu emplastre, e aprop pausa sobre aquel astela de fust o de codena, e strenh per strictura sobre la qual no temas punctacio de fractura ni remocio de la stelha.	And once you have aligned it, place a plaster on him, then put a wooden or metal splint over that and secure it tightly without fearing the puncture of the fracture or movement of the bones.
E enguala la concavitat am aquo que uempla aquela entro que aquela prengua la strictura segon equalitat, e comanda al malaute que dorma sobre le sieu dos o desobre le sieu costat sa.	Align the cavity with something that fills it to provide support according to its shape and symmetry, then instruct the patient to sleep on their back or side.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras tu cessa de extencio de lu e de la sua restauracio entro que sia sedat le apostema caut, e pausa sobre lu aquo que sede aquel segon que es precedit; e aprop retorna a la restauracio de lu, e strenh aquel ayssi cum cove.	However, if there is any sign of an abscess, you must cease the patient's extension and restoration until that abscess has subsided, then apply something to soothe it as necessary, after which you may return to his restoration process, securing him appropriately.
E si accideysso en le os satagias o son comminuidas, lahoras tu las tratz.	And if it happens that the bones are fractured or shattered, then you must treat them.

De restauracio de la fractura del adjutori.	On the restoration of the fracture of the clavicle.
Adjutori es aquo que es entre le coyde entro al cap de la spalla.	The clavicle is the bone that lies between the shoulder blade and the head of the shoulder.
E si es trencat, lahoras la restauracio de lu es en una de doas manieyras, de las quals es la una que tu prenguas fust pla de migiera groceza segon aquesta forma:	And if it is broken, its restoration can be done in one of two ways. One way is to take a flat piece of wood, of medium thickness, shaped like this:
E sian liatz en doas extremitatz dos liamentz, e aprop sia suspendut del loc elevat.	Bind it at both ends with two ligatures, then hang it from an elevated place.
E segua le malaute sobre una sezela; e aprop gieta fora le sieu bras trencat sobre le fust entro que pervengua al titillic de lu en le mieg loc del qual sia annexa la curvitat del fust.	Have the patient sit on a chair, and then stretch their broken arm over the flat piece of wood until you reach their wrist at the middle point where its curvature is attached to that of the wood.
E aprop suspen sobre aquel alcuna causa greu, o·l minestre extenda aquel a las partidas dejos; e aprop le metge eque la fractura am las sieuas mas ensemps, entro que la fractura retorne segon que cove.	Then suspend above it something heavy or have the servant stretch that to both ends of the wood piece. At this point, the doctor places his hands on either side of the fracture so that it returns to its original position.
E l’autra manieyra es que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sieua cervitz e suspen la ma del col de lu am liament; e aprop comanda a dos ministres que la un de lor tengua aquo que es desobre la fractura am las suas mas; e l’autre tengua le pus dejos de lu; e quascu de lor extenda a la sua partida.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E si voles que la extencio sia pus fort, lahoras tu strenh sobre la fractura am liament e sobre aquela am autre liament, e quascu dels dos ministres extendan a doas suas partidas.	Here is my translation of the provided text:
E donc si la fractura es propinquada a la extremitat del muscle, lahoras cove que sia pausat la mitat del liament sobre le citillic e l’autre dejos la fractura deves le coyde.	And so, if the fracture is close to the end of the muscle, then it should be placed with half of the ligament above the clavicle and the other below the fracture near the elbow.
E semblantment si la fractura es propdana al coyde, lahoras cove que sia pausat le liament sobre aquel loc e sobre aquel coyde.	Similarly, if the fracture is close to the elbow joint, then it should be positioned with the ligament placed directly above that area and also over the elbow joint.
Enguala aquela am facilitat e ses trebal, e aprop quant sira engualada segon que cove e es applicada per bona applicacio, lahoras strenh aquela si no accideys apostema caut.	This will make it easier and facilitate the work; then, when it is properly aligned according to what is required and is correctly applied, strengthen it so that no acute abscess occurs.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras layssa la strictura entro al vii dia, e pausa sobre lu lana sutza enbeguda en vi agre e oli rozat entro que repause le apostema, e lahoras tu stren aquela.	However, if an acute abscess does occur, then leave the splint in place for seven days and apply a poultice of raw wool soaked in vinegar and rose oil until the abscess subsides; afterwards, you can strengthen it again.
E la manieyra de strenher aquela es que pauses emplastre sobre la fractura, e aprop pausa envolopament de drap nau sobre le emplastre; e aprop ajuste le bras sobre aquel adjutori, e pause la sua ma uberta sobre le sieu muscle. E pausa le drap e strenh sobre le adjutori le bras per so que·l bras sia en loc de stelhas, si no prohibeys de aquo alcuna causa del os trencat. De restauracio de fractura del bras.	On the restoration of a fractured arm." 
Bras es compost de dos osses les quals so appelatz dos focils; dels quals la un es petit, e es aquel que siec le dit pous, e l’autre es gran e es aquel le qual es pausat dejos le petit dit, de la partida pus dejus.	Arms are composed of two bones which are called the two forearm bones (radius and ulna); of these one is small, it is the bone on which the thumb lies, and the other is large, it is the one that supports the smaller finger from below.
E fort leu es trencat le focil major solament, o le petit, e fort leu son trincatz ensemps.	And sometimes only the larger forearm bone is broken, or just the smaller one, and sometimes they are both fractured together.
E quan es trencat le focil petit desus, lahoras la restauracio de lu es leugiera, e la sanacio de lu es pus leugiera.	And when the smaller forearm bone is broken above, its restoration is easier, and its healing is more rapid.
E quan es trencat le focil de lu dejos la fractura de lu es mala, e la sanacio de lu es dificil.	And when the forearm bone is broken below, the fracture is bad, and its healing is difficult.
E pus mala de aquela es quan son trencatz dos osses essemps.	And worse still is when both bones are broken together.
Donc si l’os le qual es trencat es le focil petit desus, lahoras es convenient al metge, deves la restauracio de lu, que pauze petita extencio am facilitat entro que aquel sia engualhat.	Therefore, if the bone that is broken is the smaller forearm bone above, it is beneficial for the doctor to make its restoration easier by placing a small extension with facilitation so that it can be bandaged.
Mays si le focil gran es aquo que es trincat, lahoras cove que pause extencio pus vehement.	But if it is the larger forearm bone that is fractured, then you should apply a stronger extension.
E si les dos focils so ensemps trincatz, lahoras cove que tu pauses la extritura mot pus fort.	And if both wrists are held together like this, then you must place the pressing instrument much more firmly.
E cove que pauses la figura de la ma deves la restauracio de lu e la extencio de lu estenduda sobre un coyssi, e sia le pols de la ma a las partidas desus, pus aut que totz les autres ditz, e le dit auricular sia pus bas dels autres ditz, e le malaute sia cezent sobre una cezela cayrada.	You should also arrange the patient's arm in this position for their restoration and extension; place the wrist of the hand at the upper end, so that everything mentioned above is higher than it, and let the tip of the ear be lower than all the other parts mentioned; and have the patient sit on a chair with his back supported.
E sia un coyssi denant lu en la altetut o endreyt de lu, per so que·l malaute no encorra trebalh.	And there should be a cushion in front of him at the level of his hip or thigh to prevent the patient from straining.
E aprop le ministre extenda le bras de la partida pus dejos am la sieua ma o am liament, e autre ministre extenda desus semblantment.	Then the minister extends his arm from below with his hand or forearm; another minister does likewise above.
E aprop le metge engualhe le os entro que redugua aquel segon la milhor figura que pot.	Then the doctor should manipulate the bone in such a way that it reduces to its best shape.
E si en la factura del os so satagias, lahoras te perforsa raduzir tota pessa en le sieu loc am la tua vertut.	And if there is stiffness in the bone when you are reducing it, then you must use your skill to place each part back into its proper place.
E si appar en lu satagia separada que punh la codena e no es a tu speransa en la restauracio de lu, lahoras tu fen sobre lu e osta aquela segon la manieyra la qual havem dita desus.	If you find that the stiffness is separate from the bone and it's not yielding to your efforts during restoration, then stop what you're doing and treat it according to the method mentioned above.
Mays si la fractura es am plagua, yeu ja he fayt ad aquo capitol singular, e donc pren la curacio de aquel.	But if the fracture is accompanied by inflammation, I have already dedicated a separate chapter to this topic, so let's proceed with its treatment.
E si accideys apostema caut al comensament de la tua restauracio, lahoras tu lineys un drap am cerot fayt de oli rozat e cera blanca, e sia migier entre specitut e subtilitat, e strenh drap sobre aquel am strictura subtil entro que le apostema sia cedat; e lahoras remau le cerot e pausa emplastre preparat de polvera de moli am clayre de huou, e aprop pausa stelhas; e sia la stela la qual es pauzada sobre aquela fractura pus lada e pus fort.	And if an abscess occurs during the early stages of your recovery process, you should apply a cloth with a mixture made from rose oil and white wax, ensuring it is neither too hard nor too soft; secure this dressing gently but firmly until the abscess subsides. Then remove the cerate and apply an ointment prepared using moly powder mixed with egg white, making sure to place a bandage over it; let this bandage be more substantial on either side of the fracture for added support.
E sapias que·l nombre de las stelas del bras so vi en las majors disposicios, o sia la fractura en un focil o en dos focils ensemps.	Remember that the number of bandages used for an arm depends on its specific condition; this could be either a single fracture or multiple fractures occurring together.
E aprop pausa la tua strictura sobre le loc de la fractura pus fort e pus vehement, e quan mays sira la extrictura a las partidas desus de la fractura o a las partidas pus bassas de lu, pausa la strictura un pauc pus molh segon que es precedida la rememoracio de lu en le comensament del capitol.	Now apply your wrapping with greater intensity over the fracture site, ensuring it is tighter and more forceful; as you wrap above or below the fracture line, make the wrapping slightly looser according to what has already been instructed at the beginning of this chapter.
E les draps que so envolopatz sobre la fractura sian draps mols humitz, e no sian durs ni aspres, e·l fiel am le qual es strenhut sia de li propriament migier entre subtil e gros, ayssi cum havem recomtat. E considera le membre e·l liament aprop alcus dias.	And observe the limb and its ligament for several days.
E si accideys alcuna causa de la qual rectificacio es necessaria, ayssi cum prusiment le qual accideys al membre, e lahoras cove que tu enbroques le membre am aygua cauda entro que cesse aquel pruziment.	And if any cause arises that requires correction, such as when inflammation occurs in the limb, then it is necessary to immerse the limb in cold water until the swelling subsides.
E leysses le membre no costreyt entro que repause, e aprop torna la strictura.	Allow the limb to rest without constraint so that it can recover, and then return to applying the compression.
E si la extrictura ja es mollificada e l’os ja es remaugut e semblantz ad aquels, lahoras rectifiqua tot aquo am la tua vertut.	And if the compression has softened and the bone is already realigned to match its counterparts, then correct everything with your skill.
E considera mays si le nutriment es prohibit pervenir al membre per superfluitat de strictura, quar lahoras cove que mollifiques aquel un petit e laysses aquel per alcus dias entro que corra ad aquel le nutriment, e aprop strenh aquel.	But consider the possibility that nourishment is prevented from reaching the limb due to excessive compression; in such a case, you must ease the compression slightly and leave it for a few days until nourishment reaches the limb, then strengthen it.
Mays si al malaute no accideys alcuna causa de aquelas que havem ditas, lahoras no cove que sia desliat entro aprop xx dias o enviro de aquels.	However, if the patient does not experience any of the aforementioned causes, then it is not necessary to release them for around twenty days.

Sapias que a la pinche de la ma e als nuzes dels ditz tart endeve fractura, e no accideys a lor sino atricio motas veguadas.	Know that when there is a fracture of the finger and its joints, you should not apply anything except moistened wool.

And when there is a cause for an operation on the arm due to leg issues and you align the bones and complete the entire surgical procedure, then take wooden sticks from pine trees that are placed underneath the affected area, carved into the shape of crutches; attach those with thin ropes, not too thick or large in size, and make their length according to the length of the patient's leg, reaching up to the bottom part.
E aprop envolopa sobre quascuna drap en doas envolucios segon la longitut de lu, e pausa la una sobre la partida de la camba de la una part e l’autra del autra part, e sian del denol entro al pus bas loc del pe.	Here is the translation of the sentence:
E aprop lias las doas stelhas en tres locs de doas extremitatz e al mieg loc, quar am aquesta strectura la camba es prohibida de clinar a la partida dextra e sinistra, e sta per bona stacio.	And then tie the two legs in three places at both ends and in the middle point, for this position prevents the leg from bending to either side right or left, and it is a good posture.
E ja es aministrat un brasset de fust segon la longuesa de la camba; e sia pausada en lu la camba per so que conserve aquel de movement.	And a wooden brace has already been applied according to the length of the leg; it should be placed on him, on his leg, in order that he keeps still without moving.
E majorment cove que tu fassas aquo en fractura, e quan am aquela es plagua propriament.	And primarily cover the fracture in this way, for it is called 'plaster' properly.
E aprop considera en quascun jorn la camba e studia am aquel per derier studi, e tu le guardes de apostema e de imflacio o de autres causas semblantz; e cum accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, lahoras opausa te a lu am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Then each day consider the leg and examine it from behind to study its condition, watch out for sores, inflammation or similar issues; if any of these occur, treat him accordingly with what is needed until he heals.

De la fractura del talo e dels osses del pe e dels ditz.	On the fracture of the talus and bones of the foot." 
Al talo no accideys fractura de tot; mays als osses del pe accideys fractura alcunas veguadas; e als ditz del pe pauc accideys fractura, e no accideys a lor sino atricio en las mes de disposicio.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E si als osses del pe endeve fractura e vezes aquels osses esser elevatz sobre si entre lor, lahoras le malaute pause le sieu pe sobre la terra preparat ayssi cum anant.	And if there is a fracture of the bones in the foot and you see that those bones are raised up from each other, then have the patient place their foot on the ground prepared like this as they walk.
E aprop pausa la un pe sobre aquo que es elevat de aquels osses, e aprop calca aquels, e prem, e engualha aquels entro que torno en los locs.	Then place one foot on something elevated from those bones, and step on them, pressing and pushing those bones back into their places.
E aprop pausa emplastre e stopa desus, e pausa dejos le ventre del pe una petita taula a la qual sian dos caps plas.	Then place a plaster and bandage on top, and underneath the sole of the foot, put a small table with two flat ends.
E aprop strenh aquela am le pe am strectura descent, pus que tu has envolopada aquela am draps e am autres causes de las quals indigeys.	Then strengthen that with the foot in a stretched position, as you have wrapped it with bandages and other things which are necessary.
E cum a lu passan tres dias o quatre, lahoras tu deslia le liament, quar tu atrobaras les osses engualatz, o sian trincatz o sian dislocatz, e la operacio en aquels es ayssi co coneysses.	And when three or four days have passed, you can then untie the bandages and see that the bones are aligned, whether they were broken or dislocated, and perform the operation on them as you know how.
Mays si alcus ditz son trincatz, lahoras restaura aquels, e enguala aquels ayssi cum yeu e recomtat a tu en la restauracio dels ditz de la ma.	But if some say they are broken, then restore those bones and align them as I have told you about the restoration of fingers in the hand.
E aprop pausa al dit trincat stela segon la longitut del dit, e sia pus lada de lu un pauc; e aprop dejos le pe aquesta taula la qual e a tu recomtada, e strenh aquela am strictura decent.	Then place the broken finger with a splint according to its length, and put it slightly on one side of it; then underneath the foot, put this table which I have described, and secure that with a suitable bandage.
Mays si aquo que es trincat dels osses so dos o tres o mays, lahoras tu pausa sobre quascun dit astela de la sua quantitat envolopada en drap leon, e strenh la taula en le pus bas del pe, e sia stant sobre la un dels caps de la taula foro le ventre del pe per que la tengua am bona retencio.	Mays si aquo que es trincat dels osses so dos o tres o mays, lahoras tu pausa sobre quascun dit astela de la sua quantitat envolopada en drap leon, e strenh la taula en le pus bas del pe, e sia stant sobre la un dels caps de la taula foro le ventre del pe per que la tengua am bona retencio.

De fractura del conh de la femna e del os del pentenilh e de la vergua del home.	Regarding the fracture of the pubic bone in women, the penile bone, and the male genitalia." 
Quan le conh de la femna es trincat, lahoras fay aquela ceser en cezela cayrada, e aprop enclina aquela a la partida del dos un petit, e sia tenguda detras.	When the woman's uterus is constricted, then make her squat in a wide-legged position and slightly bend at the waist, keeping her back straight.
E aprop la matrona umpla le conh de coto, e sia fayt en le conh de lu ayssi cum spera; e aprop la femna sia concutida, e eleva le dos de lu petit a petit, quar tot aquo es fora-getat entro que sia denant la partida del conh ayssi cum spera e l’os trincat retorna.	Then the midwife should fill the uterus with wool or cotton, and it should be done inside the woman's body as expected; then the woman should be shaken slightly, and her back should be raised gradually, for all of this must take place before the uterus is in front of the constricted bone.
E aprop pausa pulvils sobre le dos de lu, e quan vol urinar remaugua le coto am facilitat e aprop urine, e reduzeys e retorna aquel segon la manieyra segon la qual mezist aquel al comensament, e aprop retorne al sieu pulvil primier.	Place some powdered herbs or spices on her back; when she wants to urinate, help her by providing a cloth and let her do so comfortably; then return the uterus and put it back in its original position, as you did at first, before returning to your powder.
E fassa ayssi per vii dias o enviro aquels, quar aquel es restaurat.	Do this for seven days or so, as it is being restored.
E si voles, pren una vezica de ovela e strenh sobre le trauc de lu una canula de canavera; e entromet tota la vesica en le conh de lu, e aprop ensuffla en la canula am vertut entro que la vesica sia imflada dedintz le conh, quar la fractura retorna.	If you wish, take a sheep's bladder and place a hollow piece of cane over the woman's vagina; then insert the entire bladder into her uterus, and blow into the cane with great force until the bladder is inflated inside the uterus, for this will fix the fracture.
E aprop sia umplida de coto e estia per alcus dias segon que havem recomtat, entro que sia sanat.	And then it should be filled with cataplasm and left for a few days as we have recommended, until it is healed.
E quan le os del pentenil de home o de femna es trincat, lahoras aministra en la restauracio e agulacio de lu aquo que havem recomtat en l’os del anca.	And when the bone of the pelvis (or hip joint) in a man or woman is broken, then treat its restoration and healing as we have recommended for the bones of the hip.
E aquo que es dreyt no es occultat en aquestas fracturas proprinquas e que pauc endeveno, majorment ad aquel al qual es alcun studi e us e enten aquest meu libre mot; quar aquela fractura significa a tu en las majors disposicios via dreyturiera en la restauracio e en la strictura de lu, e donc enten be.	What I am about to say is not hidden from those who are knowledgeable and have some understanding of this book; for this fracture signifies to you the most important considerations in legal proceedings regarding its restoration and healing process, and thus they will comprehend it well.
Mays en la vergua del home quan es trincada, pren guarguamela de auca, e met la vergua en aquela; e aprop pausa sobre lu envolucio de drap, e sia envolopada, e aprop sia layssada per tres dias o enviro aquels, e sia sanada.	In the case of a man's penis when it is broken, take a gourd filled with cold water, and place the penis inside; then wrap it with bandages made from cloth, ensuring it is completely wrapped up; thereafter, leave it for three days or so, and it will be healed.

De restauracio de fractura dels osses quan es am plagua.	On the healing of broken bones using plaster casts.
Convenient es ad aquel al qual accideys fractura am plagua, e majorment si le os es gran ayssi cum es le os de la cuoyssa o de l’adjutori, o semblant ad aquel, que tu te cuoytes e fleubotomes aquel tantost si las condicios de fleubotomia a tu o testifican ayssi cum desus havem dit.	It is beneficial for one who experiences a fracture requiring plaster cast to undergo venesection immediately, especially if the bone is large like the thigh or arm bones, or similar; you should perform phlebotomy as soon as the conditions are favorable for it, just as we have mentioned previously.
E si la plagua eflueys sanc, lahoras cove que tu te coytes a la retencio de lu enayssi que tu polverizes sobre lu zegi trissat, si a tu autra causa no es present.	If the plague exudes blood, then make sure you cut off its retention by dusting it with powdered dry bread, unless some other cause is at hand.
E aprop comensa restaurar la fractura en aquel meteys dia, e no prolongues aquo, si no accideys apostema.	Then begin the process of healing the fracture on that same day, do not delay it, otherwise an abscess might occur.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras tu layssa la restauracio de lu entro al ix dia, entro que sia cedat le apostema, e no apropinques a lu en le tertz dia e·l iiii de tot, quar tu faras accidir mals accidentz.	But if an abscess appears, then let the healing process take place within nine days until it subsides, and do not approach it on the third or fourth day at all, for you may cause harm.
Mays si le os trencat es eminent sobre la codena descubert, lahoras cove que te perforses reduzir aquel e engualar aquel am las tuas mas am facilitat e am pauca extencio.	If the broken bone is protruding above the skin uncovered, make sure to pierce and realign it with your hands gently and with minimal extension.
Mays si extencio no es a tu preparada e la equacio de lu am las tieuas mas, lahoras tu reduzeys aquel am las tuas mas am aquest sturment; e es sturment le qual es fayt de ferr, la longitut del qual es de vii ditz o de viii e la latitut del qual es segon la quantitat de la plagua; e per aquo es necessari al metge que prengua de aquels tres o quatre segon la quantitat que indigeys ad aquo en la curacio en tota specia de fractura.	If extension is not ready for your manipulation and the adjustment of it with your hands, then reduce it with your hands using this instrument; this instrument should be made of iron, its length being seven or eight fingers long, and its width according to the size of the wound; and therefore, it is necessary for the doctor to have three or four of these instruments depending on what's required for the treatment of any type of fracture.
E sia redon, e sia en lu pauca groceza per so que no sia doblat deves la comprecio sobre aquel en la hora de la operacio.	And whether it is round or has a small thickness so that it cannot be doubled, you must avoid compression on it during the operation.
E sia de aguda extremitat al qual sia marge en las sieuas extremitatz; e sia le desus de lu a grossetut tendent, e de la maytat de lu entro a las partidas.	And whether it has sharp ends with edges at its extremes; and let the upper part of it have a thicker tendency, while the middle part is divided.
E aquesta es la forma de lu:	And this is its form:
E es nompnat en grec “labre volentz atelarem”, so es paleta pauca.	It is named in Greek 'labra voluntas ateleram', which means 'a small paddle.'
Per que cove que sia pausada la extremitat de lu acuda elevada sobre la extremitat del os eminent.	Because it is necessary to place its pointed end with the edge elevated over the prominent part of the bone.
E inpelleys aquel en una veguada entro que retorne le os, e sia engualat am alcuna equacio.	Push it into the hollow area behind the bone until it returns to its original position, ensuring it is aligned with some accuracy.
E donc esforsa te engualar las extremitatz de la fractura entre lor, e si la extremitat de lu trencada es subtil, e no pren aquela le sturment per bona axcepcio, lahoras cove que tu inscidas la extremitat de aquel os entro que l’insturment haja poder de aquo.	Then try to align the ends of the fracture between them, and if the broken end is delicate and does not take the instrument well due to its small size, then you must insert the end of that bone so that the instrument can have a good grip on it.
Mays si no podes reduzir le os de tot am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras enscideys aquel am aquo que coveneys a lu dels inscizoris les quals havem ditz; o serra aquel am una de las serras en qualque manieyra sia a tu possible.	But if you cannot reduce the bone completely with what we have mentioned, then you must divide it with one of the incisor instruments that we described earlier; or saw it with one of the saws in any way that is feasible for you.
E aprop ratz aquel que roman en le os de asperitat e de scorsas menudas.	And it is clear that what remains in the bones are roughness and small scabs.
E cum le os es reduzit, e aprop la reduccio le malaute atroba dolor vehement ledent, lahoras sapias que le os no es retornat al sieu loc natural; e adonc fay aquo quar tu confereyses al malaute gran juvament.	And when the bone is reduced, and then the reduction causes the patient to experience intense pain again, you know that the bone has not returned to its natural position; therefore, do this as it will greatly benefit the patient.
Cum es complida la tua restauracio la qual fas al os, e lahoras submergeys drap en vi stiptic negre, e propriament si es en estiu, e no pauses sobre la plagua cerot ni autre causa en la qual sia oli, per so que no fassa en lu accidir poyredura e corropcio.	Once you have completed your restoration of the bone, immerse a cloth in dark styptic wine and apply it; specifically, if it is summer, do not place any kind of wax or oil on the wound because this could lead to infection and corruption.
E aprop aministra stelas en la hora del tieu compliment de la restauracio de l’os, e layssa la plagua descuberta enayssi que inscidas le trauc am forfexs e uses de envolucios segon la quantitat de la plagua.	Then apply stars at the time of your bone restoration ritual and leave the wound uncovered so that you can cut away any excess tissue with scissors and use dressings based on the size of the wound.
E guarda te am tota cautela que no strenhas la plagua am la fractura, quar motas veguadas an fayt aquo les fols metges, e fero accidir sobre les sieus malautes mort o malautia corrodent o zuthement, so es sania.	Exercise utmost caution to avoid stretching the wound at the fracture site because inexperienced doctors have caused this before and brought their patients death or severe illness; only health can come from it.
E si la tieua strictura leugiera, molli, diversa de la strictura de las autras fracturas.	And if your constriction is light, soft, different from that of other fractures.
E si la plagua es gran o es plagua mala, e temes sobre aquel alcus accidentz mals les quals havem recomtatz, e atrobas dolor en le loc, lahoras no cove que pauses sobre aquel astelas, mays fay ad aquel envolucio de draps durs en loc de stelas e strenh lu am aquelas. De la curacio de nodacio que accideys en le vestigi de alcuna fractura.	On the treatment of swelling that occurs in the vicinity of any fracture.
Motas veguadas accideys aquesta nodacio en le vestigi de sanacio de fractura, e majorment que es prop de las juncturas, e es orrasada per lu la figura del membre; e fort leu prohibeys le membre de la sua operacio natural.	Note that this swelling often happens near the healing site of a fracture, especially if it is close to the joints, and distorts the shape of the limb; it may even hinder the limb's natural movement.

E leyssa extrictura que no deslies aquela per motz dias; e aprop deslia aquela e itera autra, entro que sia remauguda la nodacio; o strenh sobre aquela lamina de plom descentment, quar plom ha proprietat de remaure tot aquo que es imflat en les membres.	Here is my translation of the provided text:

Capitol .xxi.	Certainly! Here is my translation of your text into English: 
De restauracio de fractura quan es restaurada e aprop aquo roman le membre subtil e freul no segon la sieua natura.	When restoring a fracture after it has been healed and the member remains delicate and feeble, not according to its natural state.
Quan fractura de os es restaurada, e aprop aquo roman le membre subtil e freul, lahoras aquo no es fayt sino per motas causas: de las quals la una es multitut de solucio del liament e de la liguacio de lu fayta no segon que cove; o per superfluitat de strictura dels liamentz entro que·l nutriment sia prohibit correr al membre; o per multitut de embrocaccio superflua; o per movement superfluent no en la sua hora; o per pauquesa de sanc en le cors del malaute e per debelitat de lu.	When a bone fracture is restored, and yet the member remains delicate and feeble, this happens for several reasons: one being an excess of fluid in the ligaments and their connections not functioning properly; or due to an overabundance of strictures within the ligaments preventing nourishment from reaching the member; or because of excessive rubbing and chafing; or due to unnecessary movement at the wrong time; or a lack of blood in the patient's body, and overall weakness.
E curacio de aquo es dar a mengar al malaute e far le cor de lu tendre entro que·l sanc sia multiplicat en lu; e aministra banh; e entromet gaug e leticia sobre lu.	To cure this, one must feed the patient and make their heart tender so that blood may multiply within them; administer baths; and bring joy and pleasure to them.
E aprop pausa pegua sobre le membre, per so que la pegua atire a lu mot nutriment, o continua embrocacio de lu am aygua tebeza, entro que·l nutriment corr e retorne a la sua figura natural.	Then place fatty meat upon the member, so that the fat may draw out nourishment; or continue to rub it with thick water until nourishment flows back into it and it returns to its natural form.
